byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

snippet: VICHY, France, Nov. 2--Marshal Philippe Petain Chief of State, has made his personal reply to the message from President Roosevelt which was delivered here on the eve of the Marshal's interview with Chancellor Hitler, it was understood here tonigh...

headline.main: PETAIN REPLY REPORTED; Vichy Says Marshal Has Sent His Answer to Washington

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 2--Marshal Philippe Petain Chief of State, has made his personal reply to the message from President Roosevelt which was delivered here on the eve of the Marshal's interview with Chancellor Hitler, it was understood here tonight.
